articles.description: Follow build-up to Thursday's Europa League action as Aston Villa visit Fenerbahce and Nottingham Forest face Braga.
articles.title: Europa League LIVE: Fenerbahce vs Aston Villa, Bologna vs Celtic, Braga vs Nottingham Forest & Rangers vs Ludogorets- score, radio commentary & text updates

articles.description: England change formats and opponents, yet still follow their dismal Ashes campaign with defeat by Sri Lanka in the first one-day international in Colombo.
articles.title: Sri Lanka vs England: Harry Brook's side lose first ODI in Colombo

articles.description: Nottingham Forest are booed off by their travelling support after Ryan Yates' own goal condemns them to a narrow defeat at Sporting Braga in the Europa League.
articles.title: Sporting Braga 1-0 Nottingham Forest: Forest slump to Europa League defeat with Ryan Yates own goal

articles.description: Jadon Sancho scores his first Aston Villa goal as they beat Fenerbahce and qualify for the Europa League last 16.
articles.title: Fenerbahce 0-1 Aston Villa: Jadon Sancho goal helps Villa reach Europa League last 16

articles.description: Celtic face an "uphill task" to progress in the Europa League, admits Martin O'Neill but the manager is demanding "heart and soul" from his players away to Bologna on Thursday.
articles.title: Bologna vs Celtic: UEFA Europa League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Manchester United say midfielder Casemiro will leave the club when his contract expires at the end of this season.
articles.title: Casemiro: Man Utd's Brazil midfielder to leave club this summer

articles.description: Rangers recorded their first Europa League victory of the season in a tight win over Ludogorets as their slim hopes of progression come to an end.
articles.title: Rangers vs Ludogorets Razgrad: UEFA Europa League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Mohamed Salah and Vinicius Jr are prime targets for Saudi Pro League, Crystal Palace hold talks with Wolves over move for Jorgen Strand Larsen, Chelsea consider loan deal for Douglas Luiz, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Salah, Vinicius Jr, Strand Larsen, Luiz, Elliot, Sargent, Lucca, Alao

articles.description: The Football Supporters' Association criticises Fifa president Gianni Infantino for making a "cheap" joke about British fans' behaviour at World Cups.
articles.title: Gianni Infantino: Fifa president criticised for 'cheap' joke about British fans' behaviour

articles.description: Derek Chisora will face former heavyweight champion Deontay Wilder in London in April in the Briton's 50th career fight.
articles.title: Derek Chisora to fight Deontay Wilder in London in April
